item.title: DRACO: A Denoising-Reconstruction Autoencoder for Cryo-EM
item.description: DRACO, a denoising-reconstruction autoencoder, revolutionizes cryo-EM by leveraging a large-scale dataset and hybrid training for superior image denoising and downstream task performance.
